name: Shovel Mario
description:
Help Mario find treasures in the deph

Game done in pygame for the Pygame Summer Jam 2021

Team Discords: Betelgeuse, narra, jinna and me.

CONTROLS:

Move -> Arrow keys

Shovel -> "Z" key

Down shovel -> "Down" + "Z" keys

Source code: https://github.com/Sweetkubuni/pygame_jam

*Note: Run the hub.py script to run the game
